license_other: The dataset is only for use by United Nations
name: unmap-international-boundaries-geojson
notes:
This dataset must remain private as the data it contains is not cleared for public release outside the United Nations.

This dataset contains the official set of boundaries approved for use in UN documents at a 1:1M scale. These boundaries are made available for use by Centre staff when making maps to ensure that Centre created maps use approved international boundaries. The boundaries are at administrative division 0 (country), 1 (state, province, etc), and 2 levels.  The subnational data originates from the CODs and were adjusted to match the UN approved international boundary designations.

You can contact gis@un.org with any questions on official UN geospatial data.

organization.name: hdx
organization.title: HDX
organization.description: The Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) is an open data sharing platform managed by the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs. The HDX organization is managed by the HDX data team and is used to share data on behalf of a number of partners

title: CONFIDENTIAL: UNMAP International Boundaries (geojson)

resources.description:
Admin3 polygon boundaries adjusted to UN admin0 international boundaries (not full global coverage).  These originate from the CODs where available and can be joined to other data with p-codes using the ADM3_PCODE field.
Attributes: alpha_3, ADM0_PCODE, ADM0_REF, ADM1_PCODE, ADM1_REF, ADM2_PCODE, ADM2_REF, ADM3_PCODE, ADM3_REF
